import React from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Building2, User, LogOut, TrendingUp, Target, CheckSquare, Calendar, Calculator, ClipboardCheck, ListTodo, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); const statCards = [ { title: 'Business Valuation', value: '$0', icon: TrendingUp, color: 'blue', bgColor: 'bg-blue-50', iconColor: 'text-blue-600', borderColor: 'border-blue-200' }, { title: 'Readiness Score', value: '0%', icon: Target, color: 'green', bgColor: 'bg-green-50', iconColor: 'text-green-600', borderColor: 'border-green-200' }, { title: 'Tasks', value: '0/0', icon: CheckSquare, color: 'purple', bgColor: 'bg-purple-50', iconColor: 'text-purple-600', borderColor: 'border-purple-200' }, { title: 'Days to Exit', value: '-', icon: Calendar, color: 'orange', bgColor: 'bg-orange-50', iconColor: 'text-orange-600', borderColor: 'border-orange-200' } ]; const quickActions = [ { title: 'Calculate Valuation', description: 'Get an accurate business valuation', icon: Calculator, color: 'blue', bgColor: 'bg-blue-600', hoverColor: 'hover:bg-blue-700', iconBg: 'bg-blue-100', iconColor: 'text-blue-600' }, { title: 'Take Assessment', description: 'Evaluate your exit readiness', icon: ClipboardCheck, color: 'green', bgColor: 'bg-green-600', hoverColor: 'hover:bg-green-700', iconBg: 'bg-green-100', iconColor: 'text-green-600' }, { title: 'View Tasks', description: 'Manage your action items', icon: ListTodo, color: 'purple', bgColor: 'bg-purple-600', hoverColor: 'hover:bg-purple-700', iconBg: 'bg-purple-100', iconColor: 'text-purple-600' } ]; return (
{/* Top Navbar */}
{/* Logo */}
ExitReady Pro
{/* User Info and Logout */}

{user?.fullName || user?.email}

{user?.email}

{/* Main Content */}
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome back, {user?.fullName?.split(' ')[0] || 'User'}! ðŸ‘‹

Here's your business exit planning overview

{/* Stats Grid */}
{statCards.map((card, index) => (

{card.title}

{card.value}

))}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

{quickActions.map((action, index) => ( ))}
{/* Additional Content Placeholder */}

Ready to Get Started?

Begin your business exit planning journey by calculating your valuation or taking our readiness assessment.

); }; export default Dashboard;
